A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't think this movie deserves a 53% audience rating\, and does it deserve a 93% critic rating. This movie deserves a 81% critic rating and a 75% audience rating I believe. Why? Because that's what this movie achieves\, an above average cinema experience. (ps i'm rating this movie 5 stars to offset the 53%). How Justice League got a higher audience rating than this movie is beyond me.
